description:
Adds a new Heartscape and its map, as well as a corresponding event.

â– Story
One day, the Heartscape of someone unknown to Ao and the girls suddenly appears before them.
Nervous, yet curious, the girls venture inside, only to discover the scattered memories of a certain female alchemist.
By exploring her memories, just what can Ao and the girls gain...?

Note: The added event does not include any voice-overs.
Note: To enjoy using the content, you must advance the game to a certain extent.

Note: For details about content, please visit the official site.
Note: This content is part of the "BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light Season Pass". 
In addition, the "BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light Ultimate Edition", which includes the "BLUE REFLECTION: Second Light Season Pass", is also available. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
name: Additional Map - Atelier Ryza Collab Dungeon
